version_description:
- Minor errors resolved

Thanks for all the suggestions sent by facebook, we take them seriously to add new features to the app

- Now you can see who sends the messages in your group chats
- Solved an error that did not show the emojis on some occasions
- Minor errors resolved

Thanks for all the suggestions sent by facebook, we take them seriously to add new features to the app
